title: Neighbor's bird feeder has positive externality

content.question: Which of the following best represents a positive externality?

choices.label: Purchasing a pass for an amusement park
Being disturbed by neighboring construction noise
Enjoying watching birds at a neighbor’s bird feeder
Dumping waste on someone else’s property

content.answer: Enjoying watching birds at a neighbor’s bird feeder

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
